SELECT c.classname as classname, c.classyear as classyear, c.classmonth as classmonth, c.classyear as classyear, c.classid as classid CASE WHEN p.refundstate = '1' then '환불' WHEN p.refundstate = '0' and month(current_date) > c.classmonth then '수강 완료' WHEN p.refundstate = '0' and c.classmonth > month(current_date) then '수강 예정' WHEN p.refundstate = '0' and c.classmonth > month(current_date) then '수강 중' END as classstatus FROM user u JOIN pay p ON u.usernum = p.usernum JOIN class c ON p.classid = c.classid WHERE u.usernum = #{usernum} AND p.paystate = '1'
AND c.classname LIKE '%${searchWord}%'
AND c.classyear * 100 + c.classmonth >= year(DATE_SUB(current_date, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)) * 100 + month(DATE_SUB(current_date, INTERVAL 3 MONTH))
AND c.classyear * 100 + c.classmonth >= year(DATE_SUB(current_date, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)) * 100 + month(DATE_SUB(current_date, INTERVAL 6 MONTH))
AND c.classyear * 100 + c.classmonth >= year(DATE_SUB(current_date, INTERVAL 12 MONTH)) * 100 + month(DATE_SUB(current_date, INTERVAL 12 MONTH))
ORDER BY p.payid DESC
